Question.Subject: Privacy in kerala,help pls..?

ChosenAnswer: house boat is a perfect place also beach resorts in trivandrum and The RAVIZ in kollam @ da syd f Ashtamudi Lake in kollam

Answers.Answer: Houseboat in Kerala is a good option for you, all the best!!!
Try Varkala, its a ammazing and is by the beach. People are open minded thr since the place is frequented by Firangs.
